metadata.description: Curated word list for tokenizer benchmarking across Nigerian languages and English
metadata.notes: Each entry has an id and equivalent translations across languages where possible. Yorùbá includes full diacritics. Nigerian Pidgin uses common spellings.

entries.ibo: Nri a dị ụtọ nke ukwuu

entries.eng: I am going to the market

entries.yor: Ẹ jọ̀wọ́, ẹ ràn mí lọ́wọ́

entries.eng: The children are playing in the compound
entries.yor: Àwọn ọmọ ń ṣeré nínú àgbàlá
entries.hau: Yara suna wasa a cikin fili
entries.pcm: De pikin dem dey play for compound

entries.eng: My grandmother told us stories every night
entries.yor: Ìyá àgbà mi máa ń sọ ìtàn fún wa ní alẹ́ gbogbo
entries.hau: Kakkata tana ba mu labari kowace dare
entries.ibo: Nne nne m na-akọrọ anyị akụkọ kwa abalị
entries.pcm: My grandmama dey tell us story every night

entries.eng: The rainy season has started and the farmers are happy
entries.yor: Àkókò òjò ti bẹ̀rẹ̀, àwọn àgbẹ̀ sì ń yọ̀
entries.hau: Lokacin damina ya fara kuma manoma suna farin ciki
entries.ibo: Oge mmiri ebidola na ndị ọrụ ugbo nwere aṅụrị
entries.pcm: Rain season don start and de farmers dem dey happy

entries.eng: Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa
entries.yor: Nàìjíríà ni orílẹ̀-èdè tó pọ̀ jù lọ ní Áfríkà
entries.hau: Nijeriya ita ce ƙasa mafi yawan jama'a a Afirka
entries.ibo: Naịjirịa bụ obodo kachasị mmadụ n'Afrịka
entries.pcm: Nigeria na de country wey get de most people for Africa

entries.eng: Education is the key to a better future for our youth
entries.yor: Ẹ̀kọ́ ni kọ́kọ́rọ́ sí ọjọ́ ọ̀la tó dára fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ wa
entries.hau: Ilimi shi ne mabuɗin kyakkyawan makomar matasan mu
entries.ibo: Agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi ihe maka ọdịnihu ka mma nke ụmụ okorobịa anyị
entries.pcm: Education na de key to better tomorrow for our young people dem

entries.eng: The new technology is transforming how businesses operate in Lagos
entries.yor: Ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tuntun ń yí bí àwọn iṣẹ́ ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní Èkó padà
entries.hau: Sabuwar fasaha tana canza yadda kasuwanci ke gudana a Legas
entries.ibo: Teknụzụ ọhụrụ na-agbanwe otu azụmaahịa si arụ ọrụ na Legọs
entries.pcm: Dis new technology dey change how business dey run for Lagos

entries.eng: President Tinubu addressed the nation on Independence Day
entries.yor: Ààrẹ Tinubu bá orílẹ̀-èdè sọ̀rọ̀ ní ọjọ́ òmìnira
entries.hau: Shugaba Tinubu ya yi jawabi ga al'umma a ranar 'yancin kai
entries.ibo: Onye isi ala Tinubu kwuru okwu nye mba a n'ụbọchị nnwere onwe
entries.pcm: President Tinubu talk to de country on Independence Day

entries.eng: The jollof rice competition between Nigeria and Ghana is legendary
entries.yor: Ìdíje irẹsì jólóf láàárín Nàìjíríà àti Ghana ti di àkàyé
entries.hau: Gasa jollof rice tsakanin Nijeriya da Ghana labari ne na tarihi
entries.ibo: Asọmpị osikapa jọlọf n'etiti Naịjirịa na Ghana abụrụla akụkọ
entries.pcm: De jollof rice fight between Nigeria and Ghana na legendary something

entries.eng: Mobile money and fintech are revolutionizing banking for the unbanked population
entries.yor: Owó orí fóònù àti fíntẹ́kì ń ṣe àyípadà ìṣòwò ilé ìfowópamọ́ fún àwọn tí kò ní àkáǹtì báńkì
entries.hau: Kuɗin wayar hannu da fintech suna juyin juya halin banki ga waɗanda ba su da asusun banki
entries.ibo: Ego ekwentị na fintech na-eme mgbanwe n'ụzọ ụlọ akụ na-arụ ọrụ maka ndị nweghị akaụntụ ụlọ akụ
entries.pcm: Mobile money and fintech dey change how banking dey work for people wey no get bank account

entries.eng: Nollywood produces more films annually than Hollywood, making it a global cultural force
entries.yor: Nollywood máa ń ṣe fíìmù tó pọ̀ ju Hollywood lọ lọ́dọọdún, èyí sì ti jẹ́ kí ó di agbára àṣà àgbáyé
entries.hau: Nollywood tana yin fina-finai fiye da Hollywood a kowace shekara, wanda ya sa ta zama ƙarfin al'ada na duniya
entries.ibo: Nollywood na-emepụta ihe nkiri karịa Hollywood kwa afọ, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ike omenala ụwa
entries.pcm: Nollywood dey make more film pass Hollywood every year, dat one make am become world power for culture

entries.eng: A child who washes their hands well eats with elders
entries.yor: Ọmọ tí ó bá wẹ ọwọ́ rẹ̀ mọ́, á bá àgbà jẹun
entries.hau: Yaro da ya wanke hannunsa zai ci abinci da manya
entries.ibo: Nwa bụ onye sachara aka ya, ya na ndị okenye rie nri
entries.pcm: Pikin wey wash im hand well go chop with big people

entries.eng: However long the night, the dawn will break
entries.yor: Bí alẹ́ bá pẹ́ tó, ọ̀sán á mọ́
entries.hau: Ko dare ya yi tsawo, gari zai waye
entries.ibo: Otu abalị si ogologo, chi ga-abọ
entries.pcm: No matter how long night be, morning go still come

entries.eng: What an elder sees sitting down, a child cannot see standing up
entries.yor: Ohun tí àgbà bá rí jókòó, tí ọmọdé bá dúró, kò lè rí i
entries.hau: Abin da babba ya gani a zaune, yaro ba zai iya ganin sa a tsaye ba
entries.ibo: Ihe agadi nwanyị nọ ala na-ahụ, nwata arịa elu osisi adịghị ahụ ya
entries.pcm: Wetin old person see sit down, small pikin no fit see am even if e stand up

entries.eng: Please transfer five thousand naira to my account
entries.yor: Ẹ jọ̀wọ́ fi ẹgbẹ̀rún márùn-ún owó náírà ránṣẹ́ sí àkáǹtì mi
entries.hau: Don Allah canja naira dubu biyar zuwa asusuna
entries.ibo: Biko ziga puku ise naira n'akaụntụ m
entries.pcm: Abeg transfer five thousand naira to my account

entries.eng: My bank app is not working, I cannot check my balance
entries.yor: Àpù báńkì mi kò ń ṣiṣẹ́, èmi kò lè ṣàyẹ̀wò owó mi
entries.hau: Appin bankina ba ya aiki, ba zan iya duba kuɗina ba
entries.ibo: Ngwa ụlọ akụ m anaghị arụ ọrụ, enweghị m ike ịlele ego m
entries.pcm: My bank app no dey work, I no fit check my balance

entries.eng: The exchange rate for dollars to naira keeps increasing every day
entries.yor: Iye owó dọ́là sí náírà ń pọ̀ sí i lójoojúmọ́
entries.hau: Farashin musayar dala zuwa naira yana ƙaruwa kowace rana
entries.ibo: Ọnụ ego mgbanwe dọla na naira na-abawanye kwa ụbọchị
entries.pcm: Dollar to naira rate dey go up every day

entries.eng: The masquerade festival is a sacred tradition in our community
entries.yor: Odún egúngún jẹ́ àṣà mímọ́ nínú ìlú wa
entries.hau: Bikin ɗan kallabi al'ada ce mai tsarki a al'ummarmu
entries.ibo: Emume mmanwụ bụ omenala dị nsọ n'obodo anyị
entries.pcm: Masquerade festival na holy tradition for our community

entries.eng: The naming ceremony will hold on Saturday at our family house
entries.yor: Ayẹyẹ ìsọmọlórúkọ yóò wáyé ní ọjọ́ Sátidé ní ilé ìdílé wa
entries.hau: Bikin suna zai kasance ranar Asabar a gidan iyalinmu
entries.ibo: Emume ịgụ aha ga-eme n'ụbọchị Satọdee n'ụlọ ezinụlọ anyị
entries.pcm: De naming ceremony go happen for Saturday for our family house

entries.eng: We give thanks to God for this new day
entries.yor: A dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ Ọlọ́run fún ọjọ́ tuntun yìí
entries.hau: Muna godiya ga Allah saboda sabuwar ranar nan
entries.ibo: Anyị na-ekele Chukwu maka ụbọchị ọhụrụ a
entries.pcm: We dey thank God for dis new day

entries.eng: Traffic in Lagos is terrible during rush hour, everyone is stuck on the road
entries.yor: Ọkọ̀ pọ̀ gan ní Èkó ní àkókò tí gbogbo ènìyàn ń lọ síṣẹ́, gbogbo ènìyàn dúró lójú ọ̀nà
entries.hau: Cunkoson ababen mota a Legas yana da muni lokacin tashi, kowa yana makale a hanya
entries.ibo: Ọkụkọ ụgbọ ala na Lagos jọrọ njọ n'oge ọrụ, onye ọ bụla nọ n'okporo ụzọ
entries.pcm: Lagos traffic bad die during rush hour, everybody don stuck for road

entries.eng: The electricity has been off for three days, we are using generator
entries.yor: Iná mọ̀nàmọ́ná ti pàdánù fún ọjọ́ mẹ́ta, a ń lo ẹ̀rọ amúnáwá
entries.hau: Wutar lantarki ta daina kwana uku, muna amfani da janareta
entries.ibo: Ọkụ latrik apụọla ụbọchị atọ, anyị na-eji jenereto
entries.pcm: NEPA don take light for three days now, we dey use generator

entries.eng: My grandmother makes the best egusi soup with pounded yam
entries.yor: Ìyá àgbà mi ló ń ṣe ọbẹ̀ ẹgúsí tó dára jù lọ pẹ̀lú iyán
entries.hau: Kakkata tafi kowa wajen dafa miyan gyada da tuwo
entries.ibo: Nne nne m na-esi ofe egusi kachasi mma na ji akpụ akpụ
entries.pcm: My grandmama dey cook de best egusi soup with pounded yam

entries.eng: Young people in Nigeria are building innovative technology startups
entries.yor: Àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Nàìjíríà ń kọ́ àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tuntun
entries.hau: Matasa a Nijeriya suna gina sabbin kamfanonin fasaha
entries.ibo: Ụmụ okorobịa na Naịjirịa na-ewu ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ ọhụrụ
entries.pcm: Young people for Nigeria dey build new new tech companies

entries.eng: Happy New Year, may this year bring prosperity
entries.yor: Ẹ kú ọdún tuntun, kí ọdún yìí mú àlàáfíà wá
entries.hau: Barka da sabuwar shekara, Allah ya sa shekara mai albarka
entries.ibo: Ọnụ ọhụrụ ọma, ka afọ a wetara anyị ọganihu
entries.pcm: Happy New Year o, make dis year bring better thing

entries.eng: The farmer planted cassava and maize before the rains came
entries.yor: Àgbẹ̀ náà gbìn ẹ̀gẹ́ àti àgbàdo kí òjò tó bẹ̀rẹ̀
entries.hau: Manomi ya shuka rogo da masara kafin damina ta zo
entries.ibo: Onye ọrụ ugbo kụrụ akpụ na ọka tupu mmịrị ọzụzọ abịa
entries.pcm: De farmer plant garri and corn before rain start
